name: Mekafusion #6 BM06-EVIL
description:
Model: BM06-EVIL ( Base Mekanoid no.06 - EVIL )
Series: CHAOS

★ Properties
• Type: Base Mekanoid
• Skills: Power Blast, Hunting
• Perks: Speed, Enhanced Strength

A Base Mekanoid soldier model main component unit for the Mekafusion CHAOS series. Made for BRAVE series that was deprogrammed and remodeled to function in dominating the Metaverse.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series of factions in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn and rendered in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to generate lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make neat robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Artwork is created in image 4000x4000 pixel resolution for collector art enthusiasts in non-fungible tokens. 

Visit my Twitter: @XTZverse (Creator of Mekafusion)


★★★★★
